input.code:
### Markdown!

This notebook can support all markdown features, such as **bold**, _italics_, [links](http://sameersingh.org/), `code`, etc.

And the equations can be inlined if definining \\(\theta\\) and \\(\pi\\) in text.

Also, editable code block without any output.
You can refer to equations too, like Equation \\(\ref{eq1}\\).
Moro supports the Scala REPL: write, compile, and run!

extraFields.aggregatedCells: ["def f(x: Int) = x*x\nf(1)","f(10)","def f2(x:Int) = x + x\nMap(10 -> \"ten\", 100 -> \"hundred\")"]

["def f(x: Int) = x*x
f(1)","f(10)","def f2(x:Int) = x + x
Map(10 -> "ten", 100 -> "hundred")","// Matrices!
val random = new scala.util.Random()
Matrix((0 until 10).map(i => (0 until 10).map(j => (i+j)+2*random.nextDouble())))"]

input.code: Using `scalaplot`, we can define simple line and bar plots.

val x = (0.0 to 6.28 by 0.25)
xyChart(x -> (math.sin(_), math.cos(_)))

extraFields.aggregatedCells:
["def f(x: Int) = x*x
f(1)","f(10)","def f2(x:Int) = x + x
Map(10 -> "ten", 100 -> "hundred")","// Matrices!
val random = new scala.util.Random()
Matrix((0 until 10).map(i => (0 until 10).map(j => (i+j)+2*random.nextDouble())))","// Vectors
val means = Seq(Seq.fill(10)(-10.0), Seq.fill(10)(10.0))
val vectors = org.sameersingh.htmlgen.Custom.Vectors(
  means.zipWithIndex.map(xi => (0 until 10).map(j => (xi._2, xi._2 + "_" + j, xi._1.map(v => v + random.nextGaussian() * 0.1)))).flatten
)
org.sameersingh.htmlgen.D3jsConverter.convert(vectors)"]

input.code:
val bx = 0 until 5
barChart(
    bx.map("x" + _) ->(bx.map(i => math.sin(i / 3.0) + 0.5), 
        bx.map(i => math.cos(i / 3.0) + 0.5)))

input.code:
### Or pretty much any file format*

Those supported by [Google Drive viewer](https://support.google.com/drive/answer/2423485?hl=en&p=docs_viewer&rd=1), i.e.

* Image files (.JPEG, .PNG, .GIF, .TIFF, .BMP) <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Video files (WebM, .MPEG4, .3GPP, .MOV, .AVI, .MPEGPS, .WMV, .FLV, .ogg)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Text files (.TXT)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Markup/Code (.CSS, .HTML, .PHP, .C, .CPP, .H, .HPP, .JS)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Microsoft Word (.DOC and .DOCX)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Microsoft Excel (.XLS and .XLSX)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Microsoft PowerPoint (.PPT and .PPTX)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Adobe Portable Document Format (.PDF)  <!-- .element: class="fragment" -->
* Apple Pages (.PAGES)
* Adobe Illustrator (.AI)
* Adobe Photoshop (.PSD)
* Tagged Image File Format (.TIFF)
* Autodesk AutoCad (.DXF)
* Scalable Vector Graphics (.SVG)
* PostScript (.EPS, .PS)
* TrueType (.TTF)
* XML Paper Specification (.XPS)
* Archive file types (.ZIP, .RAR, tar, gzip)
* Audio formats (MP3, MPEG, WAV, .ogg)
* .MTS files
* Raw Image formats
